actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1707.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to excise tax on certain trucks, buses, tractors, et cetera.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1707) Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that percentage constructive prices are to be used in cases where a manufacturer sells articles subject to the excise tax only at retail. Prohibits the use of costs as an alternative tax base.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to excise tax on certain trucks, buses, tractors, et cetera.
